structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Method of execution in event of unconstitutionality of KRS 431.220.
law.text: If a court holds KRS 431.220 unconstitutional, the prisoner shall be executed in the manner provided by KRS 431.220 as that statute read before March 31, 1998.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 220, sec. 4, effective March 31, 1998.
